long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ATA Payslip – Download Payslips, Apply for Leave & Stay Updated with Real-Time Notifications

Description:
ATA Payslip is a simple and efficient Chrome extension designed specifically for employees of ATA Analytiq Pvt Ltd. With this extension, you can:

Download Payslips: Instantly download your monthly payslips directly from the extension without having to log into the HR portal.
Apply for Leave: Quickly submit leave requests and track your attendance all within a few clicks.
Stay On Top of Important Notifications: Receive real-time updates about important company events, announcements, or other HR-related alerts.
With ATA Payslip, you can streamline your HR-related tasks and get notified about crucial updates directly in your browser.

Key Features:

Real-Time Notifications: Get instant alerts for important updates, leaves, payslips, and company news.
Download Payslips: Conveniently download your payslip without needing to log into your HR portal.
Leave and Attendance: Easily apply for leave and keep track of your attendance status.
Customizable Alerts: Set your preferences for how often and what kind of notifications you receive.
Notification History: Access all past alerts and notifications in the extension’s popup.
Silent Mode: Mute notifications whenever you need to focus.
Seamless Integration: Works in the background without slowing down your browser or workflow.
Perfect for employees who want to stay informed about their work-related updates, payslips, and more. Whether you’re checking your payslip, applying for leave, or just keeping up with notifications, ATA Payslip ensures you never miss an important update.
